item.description:
Since it was so much fun last time, let's do it again. Same place, same time.

Kick off Sunday with.....a game of Kickball. Use your kicking skills or exploit the outfield to get to first base and beyond.

For the uninitiated, kickball follows the rules of baseball, except your leg acts as the bat and a large rolling ball replaces the baseball. Kick the ball and move your team around the diamond as you dodge the fielders trying to tag you out.

Remember, you don't have to be good or play at a pro level. Just kick the ball and hope for the best.

Let's split into two teams and see who comes out on top.

For more information:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kickball

http://www.ehow.com/way_5449557_rules-kickball.html

*** If you have a ball, markers or anything else, feel free to bring it along.

 

Since there have been some issues with directions, please note that the address for the park is:

73 Dexter Street, Providence

Meet by the softball field near the armory. Its the yellow and green castle like building that's impossible to miss
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the people gathered round the ball
item.name: KICKBALL
